attributes.action: Allocate Government Funding to Assist Flood Victims in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent bad weather has left so many people in distress - belongings ruined, relatives injured or lost, whole communities badly affected.  Could I request that people sign this petition to ask the Government to allocate funds immediately to help the clean up effort and get people's lives back to normal.
